vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Ephraim living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.7.20;
son of: Tahath (H8480I);
father of: Tahath (H8480J); also called in KJV: Eladah;
§ Eladah = "God has adorned"
a descendant of Ephraim
vocabInfos._es_Definition: hijo de Táhat; tribu de Efraín
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
以拉大 这个陽性專有名詞 人名在原文的意思是 "神已裝飾"
一位以法蓮的後裔 (代上 7:20)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
以拉大 这个阳性专有名词 人名在原文的意思是 "神已装饰"
一位以法莲的后裔 (代上 7:20)
